Bohairic:
Availability: All chapters

Source: Tattam, H. 1852. Prophetas Maiores in Dialecto Linguae Aegyptiacae Memphitica seu Coptica Edidit cum Versione Latina. 2 vol. Oxford. [pp. 1:270-404]

Editing: The order of the book was changed to reflect the proper order in Coptic manuscripts. Diacritical signs modified by editor for grammatical accuracy.
Sahidic: There is no available Sahidic text
Greek:
Availability: Sussanna, Chapters 1-12, Bel & Dragon

Source: Susanna is taken from the Theodotion text retrieved from http://textualcriticism.scienceontheweb.net/APOC/Susanna2.html#chi01

Source: Daniel chapters 1-12 and Bel & Dragon are taken from the Theodotion text retrieved from  https://en.katabiblon.com/us/index.php?text=LXX&book=DnTh&ch=1

Note: There is no Greek text for Daniel D
English:
Availability: All chapters

Source: Brenton, L. C. L. (1870). The Septuagint Version of the Old Testament: English Translation.

Daniel D is taken from a French translation by Frédéric Macler which was translated to English by Roger Pearse found on www.tertullian.org/fathers/apocalypse_of_daniel_coptic_02_text.htm
Akhmimic: There is no available Akhmimic text
Fayyumic: There is no available Fayyumic text
OldBohairic: There is no available Old Bohairic text
Mesokemic: There is no available Mesokemic text
DialectP: There is no available Dialect P (Proto Sahidic) text
Lycopolitan: There is no available Lycopolitan text

Daniel chapters 1-12 and Bel & Dragon are taken from the Theodotion text retrieved from  https://en.katabiblon.com/us/index.php?text=LXX&book=DnTh&ch=1
